summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the election pamphlet, reducing the limit of the number of words allowed in statements on propositions and for candidates; making biographical information optional for candidates; substituting "Executive Director" and the "Seattle Ethics and Elections Commission"for "Administrator" and "Fair Campaign Practices" Commission; making miscellaneous changes; and amending Seattle Municipal Code Section 2.14.010 through 2.14.100 therefor.
